thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com | 3 of 78
thread.title: matthew mickiewicz
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by matthew mickiewicz

author: matthew mickiewicz
title: matthew mickiewicz
text:
Have had the system set up for about a month, and have definitely noticed a difference in the quality of the water in the kids' hair and skin. Appliances are working better as well, and its reflected in the dishes almost immediately.
The bad- There is no available "kit" to connect the soda ash dosatron (which I did not know when I bought it). With that in mind, you can make it work with PEX and Sharkbites. Instructions are just "OK". Their Youtube video was FAR more helpful. Frankly, I wish they reference the video first before proceeding.
